description: Having studied classics, this young self-taught chef decided to follow his true passion, namely cooking. He prepares dishes inspired by Sicilian traditions yet reinterpreted with a personal twist, using the best regional products. The restaurant, situated in the heart of Palermo, is quiet and elegant yet also pleasantly informal in its service.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
